ProductInfo.Features:
GW9732: Professional 32 Channel H.264 960H Real-time DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode30fps playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW808H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes: GW9732 - 32 channel DVR with 6T HD; GWLED19IN - Free 18.5" Wide Screen LED Monitor; 32 x GW808H - 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera
1 x GW1000RG59: 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; 2 x GWP1218-10A : 18 ports power box; 32 x Power pigtail (GW082); 32 x Power pigtail (GW132); 64 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 32CHE6 32 Channel H.264 960H Real-Time DVR with 32 x Color SONY CMOS Outdoor 1000 TVL and Varifocal Lens Security Camera System (White/Black)
